channel.title: Ancient magic glitch! Help!
channel.description:
So i have 2 glitches with ancients, The first is when i always cast the spell on a npc is hits like 5 feet away and shows the barrage there, how can i make it so it shows the barrage hit the npc and not like 3-5 steps away.
My second glitch is that when i weild the ancient staff, under the combat level in the weild menu it just shows -2, how do i change -2 to ancient staff.
Thanks to everybody who can help me resolve these issues.

item.title: Ancient magic glitch! Help!
item.dc:creator: @The_Unholy The Unholy
item.description:
@The_Unholy wrote:

iamapker:

for the second one open Item.cfg and search Ancient staff or -2 and then change the -2 to “Ancient Staff” or whatever you want it to be called when wielded

If it shows as -2, it’s not in item.cfg.

To add it in, go to item to cfg, and search for

item = 4674

And add this under it.

item = 4675	Ancient_staff	A_magical_staff_of_ancient_origin...	LowAlchValue	ShopValue	HighAlchValue	10	-1	40	15	0	2	3	1	15	0	50	-1

Read full topic

item.title: Ancient magic glitch! Help!
